short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uncover and explore the full spectrum of colors on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uncover and explore the full spectrum of colors on any webpage with Advance Color Picker! This powerful and user-friendly extension helps you effortlessly extract and view all the colors used on a website.

Features:

• Comprehensive Color Extraction: Quickly identify and list all unique colors used in the current webpage’s design.
• User-Friendly Interface: View colors in a clean and organized manner. Click on a color to copy its hex code to your clipboard.
• Real-Time Color Sampling: Extract colors in real-time and get accurate hex values for any website you’re browsing.

Special Thanks:

A big thank you to Ansh for their invaluable contributions to this project.

Get Started:

	1.	Click on the extension icon to open the color picker popup.
	2.	Automatically extract all colors from the current webpage.
	3.	Click on any color to copy its hex code for your design needs.

Download Advance Color Picker today and enhance your web design experience!
